title: KaryoPlayground v2.0 - Digital Karyotyping Pipeline parameters
description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for digital karyotyping analysis including CNV detection, ROH analysis, and interactive visualization

input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

samples_refs.description: Path to sample pairing file (XLS format).
samples_refs.help_text: Excel file containing sample-reference pairs defining analysis mode (paired vs single).

gsplink.help_text: Directory containing PLINK format files (.ped and .map) exported from GenomeStudio.

manifest.description: Path to Illumina array manifest file (CSV format).
manifest.help_text: Illumina manifest file containing SNP probe information and genomic coordinates.

PAR.help_text: File containing pseudoautosomal region coordinates for the reference genome.

fullTable.description: Path to GenomeStudio Full Data Table export.
fullTable.help_text: Complete SNP data table exported from GenomeStudio containing LRR and BAF values for all samples.

samplesTable.description: Path to GenomeStudio Samples Table export.
samplesTable.help_text: Sample metadata table exported from GenomeStudio containing QC metrics and sample information.

snpTable.description: Path to GenomeStudio SNP Table export.
snpTable.help_text: SNP annotation table exported from GenomeStudio with genomic positions and allele information.

nhead.description: Number of header lines to skip in manifest CSV before column headers.
nhead.help_text: Number of header lines to skip when reading Illumina manifest files. Standard manifests: 7, Demo/simplified formats: 5. Check your manifest file structure.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved.

email.help_text: Set this parameter to your e-mail address to get a summary e-mail with details of the run sent to you when the workflow exits.

reference_genome_options.title: Reference genome options
reference_genome_options.description: Reference genome related files and options required for the workflow.

fasta.description: Path to reference genome FASTA file.
fasta.help_text: Reference genome FASTA file (GRCh37 or GRCh38) with corresponding index file.

quality_control_options.title: Quality Control options
quality_control_options.description: Parameters for quality control and filtering of SNP data.

het_up_as.description: Upper heterozygosity threshold for autosomal SNPs.

het_low_as.description: Lower heterozygosity threshold for autosomal SNPs.

clust_sep_as.description: Cluster separation threshold for autosomal SNPs.

MAF_as.description: Minor allele frequency threshold for autosomal SNPs.

cnv_analysis_options.title: CNV Analysis options
cnv_analysis_options.description: Parameters for copy number variation analysis.

cnv_p_threshold.description: CNV probability threshold for calling copy number variants.
cnv_p_threshold.help_text: Minimum probability threshold for identifying copy number variants. Higher values are more stringent.

baf_threshold.description: B-allele frequency threshold for heterozygous calls.
baf_threshold.help_text: Threshold for B-allele frequency used in copy number analysis and loss of heterozygosity detection.

lrr_min.description: Minimum Log R Ratio value for analysis.
lrr_min.help_text: Lower bound for Log R Ratio values. Values below this threshold may indicate deletions.

lrr_max.description: Maximum Log R Ratio value for analysis.
lrr_max.help_text: Upper bound for Log R Ratio values. Values above this threshold may indicate duplications.

weight_lrr.description: Weight parameter for LRR in copy number calling.
weight_lrr.help_text: Relative weight given to Log R Ratio values in the copy number analysis algorithm.

max_job_request_options.title: Max job request options
max_job_request_options.description: Set the top limit for requested resources for any single job.

max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs that can be requested for any single job.

max_memory.description: Maximum amount of memory that can be requested for any single job.

max_time.description: Maximum amount of time that can be requested for any single job.

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to save pipeline results to output directory.
